  - /img/cover.png
r_init: |-
  
description: The Government of Canada spent an estimated $98.1M
  in 2021-2022 on contracts with I M P Group. The average
  contract duration was 4.32 years, and the average contract value
  (not including contracts under $10k) was $321.8M. The longest
  contract was 23.01 years. The largest contract by value (including
  amendments) was $2.3B.
lookup_name: 'I M P GROUP'
most_recent_fiscal_year_total: '98.1M'
most_recent_fiscal_year_year: '2021-2022'
s431_number_of_contracts: '7'
s431_number_of_contracts_with_amendments: '3'
s431_number_of_contracts_amendments_percentage: '43%'
s432_mean_amendment_increase_percentage: '413%'
s434_mean_number_of_amendments: '1'
s433_total_amendment_increase_value: '2.1B'
s424_mean_duration: '4.32'
s421_mean_contract_value: '321.8M'
s425_max_duration: '23.01'
s422_max_contract_value: '2.3B'
---
